message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this high-quality product. I'm confident you'll find it incredibly valuable. My initial asking price is $250. Let me know what you think!
Your price is too high. I'm only willing to pay $100 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $100 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle? I can offer it to you for $220.
I can get this for $150 from another seller. I'll offer you $120 now to save myself the trouble.
